articles.description: The new 2022 Citroen C5 Aircross facelift has been launched in the Indian market. The updated model lineup comes in Shine, which is priced at Rs 36.67 lakh. One must note that the aforementioned price is introductory, ex-showroom Delhi. Similar to the previou…

articles.author: Feroze Jamal
articles.title: Ecommerce as a sector will become irrelevant: ONDC chief - YourStory
articles.description: ONDC Chief Executive T. Koshy throws down the gauntlet ahead of the unfurling of an ‘UPI moment for ecommerce’, as banks and fintech platforms, too, prepare to open digital storefronts linked to the open protocol.
articles.content: The CEO of the Open Network for Digital Commerce scrolls down his Paytm app to a section tagged ONDC to order a salad from a restaurant nearby. Its too early, and the eatery isnt open yet. But its a … [+8944 chars]
